title: Episode 1083 - Michael Yo
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Comedian Michael Yo joins the show to talk about his days as a celebrity red carpet reporter for E!, the impressions he got of the 45th President from the times he interviewed Donald Trump, why he's glad he released his comedy special on YouTube instead ...
itunes:summary:
Comedian Michael Yo joins the show to talk about his days as a celebrity red carpet reporter for E!, the impressions he got of the 45th President from the times he interviewed Donald Trump, why he's glad he released his comedy special on YouTube instead of shopping it to Amazon or other streaming platforms, and how The Rock tried to help jumpstart his career.

 

Watch Michael Yo's special "I Never Thought" on YouTube
